caption.center: CHARLOTTE HOFFMAN INZINNA, WIFE OF JOSEPH JOHN INZINNA v. JOSEPH JOHN

opinion.posture: In re Inzinna, Joseph John, applying for writ of certiorari and/or review, writ of prohibition and mandamus to the Court of Appeal, Fifth Circuit, No. 83-CA-853; Parish of Jefferson, 24th Judicial District Court, Div. "D", No. 237-838.
opinion.opinion_text:
[1] Denied.
[2] CALOGERO and DENNIS, JJ., would grant the writ.
